Articles.Content: With 1.1 I've seen a great boost in FPS but my timer is still always yellow, meaning game time is passing slower than real time. I used a hand watch and saw every game second took about three real seconds. Can anything be done about this?
I would say either turn your settings lower or get a better computer. Maybe if you have a lot of mods that could be it too.
Often this happens in atmosphere. Often it's the aero effects. You can try turning them off in the settings and see if that helps.
